meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>shift</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to shift</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: All that dubstep (<reading>うつ</reading>うつうつうつうつ) playing downstairs is causing all of your glassware <vocabulary>to shift</vocabulary> off the shelf and onto the floor. Damn that dubstep. うつうつうつうつうつ♪
